text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Die <BIBL><TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE> <YEAR>1729</YEAR></BIBL>. Die <BIBL><TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE> <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Schweitzer- Chronick</TITLE></BIBL>, das <BIBL><TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE></BIBL>, samt noch einigen anderen neuen frantzösisch historischen Bücheren, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese Bücher zu verkauffen in Commission hat.</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"Structural fixes were required because two advertised titles were missing closing and opening <BIBL> tags, leading to improper nesting of bibliography items. Specifically, <BIBL> was missing after 'Schweitzer- Chronick' and around 'Reich der Todten'. Additionally, non-standard character encoding sequences (e.g., \\u221a\\u2202, \\u221a\\u00fc) were corrected to standard German characters (ö, ü), and the hyphenated, encoded word 'Commi- \\u221a\\u00fcion' was standardized to 'Commission'."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Die <BIBL><TITLE>Mangoldische Bibel</TITLE> <YEAR>1729</YEAR></BIBL>. Die <BIBL><TITLE>Jelische Lexicon</TITLE> <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stettlers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Schweitzer- Chronick</TITLE></BIBL>, das <BIBL><TITLE>Reich der Todten</TITLE></BIBL>, samt noch einigen anderen neuen frantzösisch historischen Bücheren, davon der Catalogus bey Herrn M. Daniel Meyer im Collegio zu sehen ist, als welcher diese Bücher zu verkauffen in Commission hat.</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: Structural fixes were required because two advertised titles were missing closing and opening <BIBL> tags, leading to improper nesting of bibliography items. Specifically, <BIBL> was missing after 'Schweitzer- Chronick' and around 'Reich der Todten'. Additionally, non-standard character encoding sequences (e.g., \u221a\u2202, \u221a\u00fc) were corrected to standard German characters (ö, ü), and the hyphenated, encoded word 'Commi- \u221a\u00fcion' was standardized to 'Commission'.
